title: Immunization
cleaned_text: Prevention and Control Division 651-201-5414 Contact Info Infectious Disease Epidemiology, Prevention and Control Division 651-201-5414 Last Updated: 09/05/2023 Immunization Immunizations, vaccinations, or shots are one of the best weapons we have against a number of serious diseases. Data on immunization gaps we are seeing due to the COVID-19 pandemic in pediatric populations in Minnesota. Includes information on how health care providers and public health partners can help address these gaps. - [Me and My Family](/people/immunize/basics/index.html) [Infants, Children, and Care](/people/immunize/ed/index.html) [School Health Personnel Immunization and Disease and Underinsured [MIIC (Immunization Registry) Statistics and Reports](/people/immunize/miic/stats/index.html) - Contact -
